actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation of pate de foie gras made from the livers of ducks or geese which have been force-fed by mechanical means.

summary.text: Prohibits the importation of pate de foie gras made, in whole or in part, from the livers of ducks or geese which have been force-fed by mechanical means.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation of pate de foie gras made from the livers of ducks or geese which have been force-fed by mechanical means.
